activities: LEVEL-5 International America, Inc. (We) collect personal information from guests that are submitted through our website contact forms or career postings. Depending on the activity, the personal information that we collect includes: first and last name, email address, phone number, city, country, and company name. The personal information collected can be used for the following activities: respond to support requests or other customer service related inquiry; initiate contact between potential business partners; correspond with job posting applicants. We do not share, sell, or rent your personal information to third parties without your consent. We do not require personal information to access our website. We will only retain personal information about you for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law and/or regulations.
